testsuite.name: testcases.TestCase_validatePurchaseOrder
testsuite.system-out: User logins to Application and is on Home Screen Shop cart is Empty. Can continue Shopping !! Click on Desktops from Computers Panel Available Desktops : [Build your own cheap computer, Build your own computer, Build your own expensive computer, Simple Computer] Please select desired one from available items User selects Build your own expensive computer from available items Choose available features for wishlist Product and proceed to Payment Screen User selects Processor - Medium User selects RAM - 4GB User selects HDD - 320 GB User selects Software - Image Viewer Product Price is 1800.00 User increases quantity to 3 Add the Product to cart Product has been added to cart successfully without any issue User is on Checkout Page User selects Billing Address New Address Field First name entered as Planit Field Last name entered as Test Field Email entered as planittest78@gmail.com Field Company entered as Planit Technologies Ltd Field Country entered as Canada Field State entered as Ontario Field City entered as Toronto Field Address 1 entered as 1562 Sheppard Ave Field Address 2 entered as MST 1 4 Field Zip entered as 416868 Field Phone number entered as 1098765432 Select Shipment Type as - Next Day Air Select Shipment Type as - Cash On Delivery Payment Method type is displayed - You will pay by COD Order has been placed succesfully with Order number: 1391288 User naviagted back to Home Screen !
